data.message: Tbh im a em fan but i give props to both cause dont act like ya dont like music from both we all know he would do drake extra filty but since this beef bullshit aint true lets respect the pic . P.s drake one happy man he got that out the way 😂😂

When you call someone a dumbass at least do it properly. *You're* a dumbass Kirk...

I like old Drake, after Take Care his music went to trash. Dude turned into Wayne after The Carter 3. Just puts out garbage. Young Money ruins careers. 😂😂😂
Em has always been a beast. There's very few rappers that have been for the most part pretty consistent over their career and Eminem is one of them.
I ain't frontin'; I actually can't stand that mumbly shit from retards like Future, Meek and Drake. Whack ass mo'fuckahs don't deserve to be called MC's let alone rappers.

There was never any beef, the media twisted what drake said, and what drake said was out of sportsmanship of the rap game. Drake knew Eminem would kill him, but that doesn't mean drake wouldn't try to take a shot if it came down to it. Lame ass people believing whatever the media throws out there. Eminem will go down as king of rap, no doubt. Drake will always be known for making hit after hit, very talented dude
I dont like drake and yea im not acting
